Apply selection  1 -> Remove clusters in first and last columns 

Apply selection 11 -> Remove clusters out of time (Event Based) 
                      |TLeading -TLeadingMeanOverEvent| <= m_Cut_Stage11_EventBased (=     3)

Apply selection 120 -> Remove clusters out of time  
                      m_Cut_Stage120_TLow <= TLeading <= m_Cut_Stage120_THigh 
                      m_Cut_Stage120_TLow  =  170
                      m_Cut_Stage120_THigh =  215

Apply selection 15 -> Remove Events with an average pad multiplicity too high or too low 
                      Pad Multiplicity >  m_Cut_StageT15_APM_Low  (=  2.0)
                      Pad Multiplicity <= m_Cut_StageT15_APM_High (=  4.0)

Apply selection  5 -> Reject Events with too few clusters
                      NClusters >= m_Cut_Stage5_NCluster_Low (=   34)
